pullrequest.title: Draft of SDF elements section (<level> and <performer>)

content.raw:
Is it possible to simplify the specification to just having `<level>` reference models? 

I'm thinking whether or not it’s better to just let our system be auto compute these `<performer>` parameters instead of relying on user input? Giving users more control is nice but I find that specifying a bounding box for objects  is mostly a trial and error process \(like when we’re making simple shape collisions for a complex mesh\).
